lines.text: I'm thinking about taking a vacation.
If I were you, I'd buy a bomb-proof condo in Antarctica.
Chauncey's my abbreviator. He shortens people.
[Chauncey takes out an axe from a suitcase]
That's good, that's good, 'cause I've had just about a long enough day to take you on!
[after smashing Kyd's desk, Chauncey chants merrily while waving his axe in front of Kyd's face]
Give him the axe, give him the axe, where where where? Right on his neck, right on his neck, there there there.
[slaps Kyd in the face, and leaves laughing]
The last time I got involved with movie-people, I went home and I stuck my finger down my throat!
